testcase.name: User should be able to login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on login page.................................................passed When User enters valid "standard_user" and "secret_sauce"...................passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User should be able to login successfully..............................passed

testcase.name: User should not be able to login with Invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on login page.................................................passed When User enters valid "steve Austin" and "secret_sauce"....................passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User should get error message of "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service".passed

testcase.name: User should not be able to login with Invalid credentials 2
testcase.system-out: Given User is on login page.................................................passed When User enters valid "Invalid user" and "InvalidPassword".................passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User should get error message of "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service".passed

testcase.name: User should not be able to login with Invalid credentials 3
testcase.system-out: Given User is on login page.................................................passed When User enters valid "locked_out_user" and "secret_sauce".................passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User should get Locked error message of "Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out.".passed
